mod.name: === Forge ===
mod.description: Client Only Mods.

mod.name: Minecraft Forge
mod.description: The backbone of modded Minecraft.

mod.name: === Dependencies ===
mod.description: Client Only Mods.

mod.name: Baubles
mod.description: Adding a touch of bling to Minecraft

mod.name: === Core Mod ===
mod.description: Client Only Mods.

mod.name: Actually Additions
mod.description: Do you want Automation? Wireless Transport? Better Machines? A cup o' Coffee? Chests? Better Hoppers? Leaf Blowers? Faster Growth? Plants? Well, Actually Additions has all that and a lot more!

mod.name: Advanced Generators
mod.description: Freeform Multiblock generators that produce MJ, RF and EU

mod.name: airbreathercore
mod.description: A library of classes used by all my mods

mod.name: Alt F4
mod.description: Simple upgrade to the vanilla furnace, with experience management, and a customizable smelting list

mod.name: AppleCore
mod.description: An API for modifying the food and hunger mechanics of Minecraft

mod.name: ArchitectureCraft
mod.description: Architectural features for your Minecraft buildings

mod.name: AuraCascade
mod.description: A magic mod focused on emergent complexity and enabling unique designs

mod.name: Bagginses
mod.description: More bags? More bags!

mod.name: Base Metals
mod.description: This mod adds historically common metals to Minecraft

mod.name: BD Lib
mod.description: A library of generic code for my other mods

mod.name: Biomes O' Plenty
mod.description: Adds over 75 new biomes, blocks, and more!

mod.name: Blood Magic: Alchemical Wizardry
mod.description: Rituals, spells, and more!

mod.name: Bookshelf
mod.description: Library of useful functions used by TeamBR

mod.name: Botania
mod.description: Botania is a mod that adds nature magic to Minecraft.

mod.name: BuildCraft
mod.description: Extending Minecraft with pipes, auto-crafting, quarries, engines and much more!

mod.name: Caterpillar
mod.description: Adds a caterpillar drill to Minecraft.

mod.name: Chameleon
mod.description: Shared code and render support for mods. Used by jaquadro's mods.

mod.name: Chisel
mod.description: Chisel: A New Hope. For 1.7 and 1.8!

mod.name: Chisels & Bits
mod.description: a mod about Sculpting, Decorating and Aesthetics

mod.name: ComputerCraft
mod.description: ComputerCraft adds Computers, Programming and Robotics to Minecraft.

mod.name: CraftingSlabs
mod.description: A simple mod to add slab versions of the crafting table

mod.name: Crafting Tweaks
mod.description: Allows you to rotate or clear the crafting matrix by the press of a button, in any (supported) crafting window.

mod.name: CrashLogReporter
mod.description: Sends crash reports to the modpack author!

mod.name: Criss Cross
mod.description: A Criss-Cross of Vanilla-Styled Machinery!

mod.name: Custom Main Menu
mod.description: Allows you to edit the mainmenu using json

mod.name: Resource Loader
mod.description: Allows mod pack creators / users to add their own custom textures to minecrafts resources without making a resource pack.

mod.name: MainMenuFiles
mod.description: Files for MainMneu

mod.name: Cyclops Core
mod.description: Coremod for EvilCraft, Integrated Dynamics and others.

mod.name: DummyCore
mod.description: A library for all mods made by DummyThingking team

mod.name: Electric Advantage
mod.description: Add electricity to your game with this Power Advantage add-on

mod.name: Ender-Rift
mod.description: The Powered Bottomless Storage System

mod.name: EnderTanks
mod.description: Store liquids inside a subspace pocket located in the End.

mod.name: Ender Utilities
mod.description: Some random, hopefully fun, and possibly even useful utilities (Modjam 4)

mod.name: Ender Zoo
mod.description: More Mobs

mod.name: EvilCraft
mod.description: An evil mod for Minecraft.

mod.name: EZ Storage
mod.description: Storage: Simplified.

mod.name: Fast Leaf Decay
mod.description: Increases leaf decay rates.

mod.name: Flat Colored Blocks
mod.description: A Minecraft mod about building with vast quantities of colored blocks.

mod.name: ForgeSlack
mod.description: Connects Minecraft and Slack

mod.name: Foundry
mod.description: Liquid Metals

mod.name: Furnus
mod.description: A configurable furnace

mod.name: Harvest
mod.description: Right click crop harvesting

mod.name: HelpFixer
mod.description: Fixes the help command from mod derpyness

mod.name: In Case of Emergency
mod.description: Keeps your inventory safe when you die.

mod.name: Intangible
mod.description: Music for the Soul

mod.name: Integrated Dynamics
mod.description: Take full and automated control of your appliances.

mod.name: Inventory Tweaks
mod.description: Tweaks to inventory handling for ease of use, including sorting and automatic replacement of broken tools or exhausted stacks of items.

mod.name: Iron Backpacks
mod.description: Upgradeable backpacks.

mod.name: Iron Chest
mod.description: New chests with larger sizes, with in-place upgrade items. The feature chest is the crystal chest, which is transparent - some inventory contents are visible without opening the chest

mod.name: JAPTA
mod.description: A few neat blocks and items for RF

mod.name: Java Version Checker
mod.description: Nobody ever sees this!

mod.name: Just Enough Items
mod.description: Simple recipe and item helper.

mod.name: Just Enough Items Addons
mod.description: Mod addons for JEI.

mod.name: Just a Few Fish
mod.description: Adds a few fish, to go along with the vanilla items!

mod.name: Just Enough Resources
mod.description: Adds Resources and Mob Drops to JEI

mod.name: K4Lib
mod.description: Library used for K4Unl's mods

mod.name: LaunchGUI
mod.description: Creates a GUI at the start to be customized how you wish.

mod.name: LunatriusCore
mod.description: A collection of utilities for Lunatrius' mods.

mod.name: Mantle
mod.description: Shared code for Slime Knights mods and others.

mod.name: McJtyLib
mod.description: McJtyLib library for RFTools, Deep Resonance, ...

mod.name: MCMultiPart
mod.description: A universal multipart API for MC 1.8.9

mod.name: MmmMmmMmmMmm
mod.description: Provides a test dummy that can be placed in the world. Punch it, kick it, slice it, push it, pop it, twist it,....

mod.name: MoarSigns
mod.description: A mod that adds a lot of different signs.

mod.name: Mod Name Tooltip
mod.description: Show the ItemStack's mod on its tooltip.

mod.name: More Furnaces
mod.description: Three new furnaces: Iron, Gold, Obsidian and Diamond Furnace.

mod.name: Morpheus
mod.description: Morpheus is a server-only mod that adds sleep voting to a forge based server. When a player sleeps, all other players in the same dimension are notified so it is easier to coordinate.

mod.name: NeoTech
mod.description: Ore Processing

mod.name: Nether Essence
mod.description: Adds Nether Essence

mod.name: NetherPortalFix
mod.description: Ensures correct destinations when travelling back and forth through Nether Portals in Multiplayer.

mod.name: NotEnoughKeys
mod.description: Upddated Version of Okushama's NotEnoughKeys. Sorts the Controls gui system and adds optional modifiers (SHIFT, CTRL, ALT) to keys.

mod.name: Not Enough Wands
mod.description: Wands, wands, and more wands

mod.name: OpenComputers
mod.authors: Florian 'Sangar' Nuecke,Johannes 'Lord Joda' Lohrer,Everyone who contributed to the mod on Github - thank you!
mod.description: This mod adds modular computers and robots that can be programmed in Lua.

mod.name: Ore Dictionary Converter
mod.description: Convert between different versions of the same ore using the Forge Ore Dictionary

mod.name: Pam's Clay Spawn
mod.description: Adds configurable clay and hardened clay spawns to Minecraft

mod.name: Pam's Get all the Seeds!
mod.description: Adds carrots, potatoes, melon seeds, and pumpkin seeds to the Tall Grass drop list.

mod.name: Player Rugs
mod.description: Decorate your Minecraft world with your "favourite" players!

mod.name: Portable Crafting
mod.description: Stores crafting items, nifty buttons, just a handy little mod.

mod.name: Power Advantage
mod.description: API for power DrCyano's power systems mods.

mod.name: Pressure Pipes
mod.description: Unlimited Fluid Transport

mod.name: Progressive Automation
mod.description: A mod that adds automation that can be built in the early game and upgraded throughout late game.

mod.name: Psi
mod.description: Psionic Spellcating Instruments

mod.name: Quickstart
mod.description: Things to help you get started quickly.

mod.name: Random Things
mod.description: Random Things packed into one Mod.

mod.name: Realistic Torches
mod.description: A lightweight mod that adds some realism to torches, increasing the difficulty of the early game.

mod.name: RebornCore
mod.description: RebornCore, A core set of classes.

mod.name: Redstone Paste
mod.description: Adds a paste form of redstone, which can stick to various surfaces.

mod.name: Reliquary
mod.description: Two words: magical swag. Oh, and a gun.

mod.name: RFTools
mod.description: RedFlux tools

mod.name: RFTools Dimensions
mod.description: RFTools Dimensions Addon

mod.name: Steam Engines Mod
mod.description: The mod implements machines like mill, double oven, saw and a block sensor to the game, also a complete piping system with v...

mod.name: ShadowMC
mod.description: A library mod required for all my other mods.

mod.name: ShetiPhian-Core
mod.description: Core set of files needed by ShetiPhians mods

mod.name: Silent's Gems
mod.description: When diamonds won't cut it.

mod.name: Similsax Transtructors
mod.description: Now you can place blocks *behind* the block you click on!

mod.name: Simple Dimensions
mod.description: A simple mod that allows you to create additional dimensions.

mod.name: Simple Fluid Tanks
mod.description: Adds fluid tanks of variable size and shape.

mod.name: Simple Retrogen
mod.description: Simple Retrogen for mods using IWorldGenerator to generate their world stuff.

mod.name: Simply Sledgehammers
mod.description: Simply adds ore multiplying hammers.

mod.name: Snad
mod.description: You're finally able to have your sugarcane grow faster. What could possibly be better than that?

mod.name: Sodacan Utilities
mod.description: Some pretty neat things and stuff

mod.name: Stackie
mod.description: Stack entities into groups to decrease lag.

mod.name: Steam Advantage
mod.description: A Power Advantage add-on that adds steam-powered technology to your Minecraft game

mod.name: Storage Drawers
mod.description: Multi-drawer storage blocks for quick storage and retrieval.

mod.name: Storage Network
mod.description: Inventoriy Cables.

mod.name: Substratum
mod.description: Base resources and crafting materials.

mod.name: Tinkers' Construct
mod.description: A little of this, a little of that, a lot of tinkering, and a lot of tools

mod.name: Thaumcraft
mod.description: Adding a touch of magic to Minecraft

mod.name: ThaumicBases
mod.description: A huge addon to an amazing mod named Thaumcraft by Azanor

mod.name: Thaumic Infusion
mod.description: TC5 ADDON - Use aspects to change blocks functionallity

mod.name: ThutCore
mod.description: API used by Thut's Mods

mod.name: Thut's Elevators
mod.description: Adds elevators to minecraft

mod.name: TIS-3D
mod.description: TIS-100 inspired low-tech computing for Minecraft.

mod.name: Totemic
mod.description: Totem Poles? Totem Poles!

mod.name: Vein Miner
mod.description: When a configured block is harvested a chain reaction is initiated to break connected blocks of the same type. Takes durability and health for each block mined.

mod.name: Waila
mod.description: Waila (What Am I Looking At) is a UI improvement mod aimed at providing block information directly ingame.

mod.name: What Are We Looking At
mod.description: Greatly expands upon the amount of information provided by the Waila HUD, along with bridging support between Waila and many other minecraft mods!

mod.name: Yet Another Food Mod
mod.description: Adds some more food to the game. Yeah yeah, it's been done before, just not by me. Icons by skidznet.

mod.description: Client Only Mods.

mod.name: === Server Mod ===

mod.name: BetterFps
mod.description: Performance Improvement

mod.name: Chunk Animator
mod.description: A small client side mod that animates the appeareance of chunks so that they don't just instantly appear

mod.name: EiraIRC
mod.description: Connect your server or client to IRC and Twitch Chat and easily share your screenshots with other players.

mod.name: JourneyMap
mod.description: JourneyMap Unlimited Edition: Real-time map in-game or in a web browser as you explore.

mod.name: Mouse Tweaks
mod.description: A mod that enhances the inventory management by adding various additional functions to the usual mouse buttons.

mod.name: Neat
mod.description: Minimalistic Functional Unit Plates for the modern Minecrafter

mod.name: ReCubed
mod.description: A mod that tracks all sorts of stats!

mod.name: Time HUD
mod.description: Adds an HUD showing the time and date. Highly configurable.

mod.name: vChat
mod.description: Bucket Style Chat settings.
